sub_title: Finance Lead | Supply Chain Finance | FP&A | Business Controlling | Supply Chain Controlling | Business Partnering | Finance Strategy
summary:
Industrial Engineer (BSc) with majors in finance and operational research. 
10 years of experience working as finance business partner for supply chain, management & marketing teams, with experience in FMCG & Medical Devices companies, focusing on the achievement of profitability improvements & costs optimization
International work experience with written and spoken fluency in Spanish, English and German, and ability to work in a culturally diverse environment.
Strong analytical, numerical and communication skills with demonstrated capabilities to build effective relationships as financial business partner. Strong SAP and BI tools knowledge.
